project_name.justification: The authoritative project name is Scossa. The text refers to it as 'the Scossa Mine Property (the "Scossa Property")'.

company_name.justification: The authoritative company name provided is 'Romios Gold Resources Inc.'. The text confirms this company is a party to the transaction: 'Star Gold Corp. (OTCQB: SRGZ) ("Star Gold") and Romios Gold Resources Inc. (TSXV: RG) (OTC Pink: RMIOF) (FSE: D4R) ("Romios Gold") are pleased to announce their intent to enter into a share purchase agreement...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The buyer is Star Gold Corp. The text identifies its chairman as: 'Lindsay Gorrill, Chairman, Star Gold Corp.'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Star Gold is acquiring 'all issued and outstanding shares of Romios' wholly owned affiliate Romios Gold Nevada Inc. which includes all the rights and interests in the Scossa Mine Property'. Acquiring 100% of the subsidiary that owns the project equates to a 100% interest acquisition.

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative primary commodity is Au. The text confirms this, describing the project as 'the Scossa mine property (Nevada) which is a former high-grade gold producer'.

verified_article_link.justification: The article, titled 'Star Gold and Romios Gold Announce Letter of Intent Regarding Top Tier Nevada Gold/Silver/Copper Projects - The Scossa Mine and Kinkaid Properties', directly concerns the acquisition of the Scossa project.

currency.justification: A condition of the transaction involves a capital raise denominated in USD: 'Closing of the Share Purchase Agreement shall not occur prior to the closing of a capital raise of not less than one million, five hundred thousand dollars (USD$1,500.000).'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The consideration for the acquisition is in the form of shares, not cash.

share_payments_raw.justification: While the number of shares issued is specified, a price per share for the transaction is not provided, so a total share payment value cannot be calculated.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: No combined cash and share value is provided for the transaction.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The project's share is 10,191,802, calculated as half of the total 20,383,604 shares issued to Romios Gold. This consideration is for the acquisition of the affiliate holding both the Scossa and Kinkaid properties (N=2). The total share amount is stated as: 'The share distribution of Star Gold (OTCQB: SRGZ) at the time of Closing... Romios Gold - 20,383,604 (60.00%)'.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned as part of the transaction consideration.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options are mentioned as part of the transaction consideration.

issued_share_price.justification: No price per share is mentioned for the transaction. The detailed quote section refers to Romios Gold (the seller), not Star Gold (the buyer/issuer), so the fallback price from the quote cannot be used.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters is mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No exploration spending commitment is mentioned for the Scossa project. The capital raise mentioned is a condition for closing the transaction, not a direct exploration commitment on the property.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) is mentioned as being acquired or retained as part of the transaction terms for the Scossa project.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states the Scossa property size is 'a mix of 50 mining claims and private lands totalling 541 hectares (1,336.8 acres)'.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text specifies the unit for the area: '...totalling 541 hectares (1,336.8 acres)...'

resource_size.justification: The text does not provide a formal mineral resource estimate for the Scossa project. It indicates that 'Records of past work on the adjacent 4 parallel veins are too incomplete to allow for a robust model'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as Star Gold Corp., and its ticker and exchange are provided in the text: 'Star Gold Corp. (OTCQB: SRGZ) ("Star Gold")'.
